content: this baby blanket is a straightforward design in which i utilized the basic principles for calculating a square blanket using stash yarn i had on-hand i ve added the tips to the downloadable pdf the calculations are meant to be an aide to those who wish to create this blanket in any size or using any stitch pattern they like go for it to skip the pattern and just read my calculation tips check out the project here http //www ravelry com/projects/narangkar/chocolate-parfait-baby-blanket 1 **please note row 27 on the chart has an accidental blank spot this is a typo treat as a plain knit stitch if you re having trouble with line 31 on the chart help is in the comments section** 1 http //www ravelry com/projects/narangkar/chocolate-parfait-baby-blanket
